title: Add in-app publishing guidance and deploy-failure retry instructions

requirements.text: Add an in-app “Publishing & Deployment” help section that explains (in English) how to publish the app and what to do if a deploy/build fails, including a clear instruction that if deployment fails the user should rerun deployment, and a checklist for what to try when changes are not visible after a successful deploy (hard refresh, reset app cache, disable offline cache/service worker). Place this section on the Account Status page so it is easy to find.

quotes: bagaimana publish nya? jika deploy gagal di ulangi lagi saja.

acceptanceCriteria: Account Status page includes a clearly titled “Publishing & Deployment” section with step-by-step guidance written in English.

The guidance explicitly covers: (1) how to publish/deploy, (2) what to do when deploy fails (retry/rerun deployment), and (3) what to do when the deploy succeeds but UI doesn’t update (hard refresh + cache/service worker actions).
The section contains a direct link/button that scrolls/navigates to the existing Troubleshooting tools on the same page (or opens them via the existing #troubleshooting anchor).

requirements.text: Extend the existing Pre-Publish Gate UI to include a small “Post-deploy verification” subsection (English) with 3–5 checkboxes focused on confirming the new version is actually live (e.g., verify footer/version-visible change, reload without stale cache, confirm key routes load). Include a short note that if verification fails due to stale assets, use the Troubleshooting tools to clear caches and then retry verification.

quotes: bagaimana publish nya? jika deploy gagal di ulangi lagi saja.

acceptanceCriteria: Pre-Publish Gate shows a dedicated post-deploy verification subsection with checkboxes.
Copy is in English and explicitly mentions using Troubleshooting actions if the new build appears not to be live due to caching.
There is a link/button from the Pre-Publish Gate area to the Troubleshooting section (or the Account Status troubleshooting anchor).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components must be composed, not modified).
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Do not implement actual automated deployment/publishing or CI logic; only add in-app guidance and verification UI.
Do not add new authentication providers or payment methods.
